column4: If I could stop realplayer from being sooo sloow in firefox i would wake up...
sometimes it helps to delete the *sw* plugins for realplayer (don't know why)
real has a couple of plugins with sw in them ( I guess they are supposed to do shockwave but I've never seen it work)
removed those sw plugins, seems better, thanks!
i got that tip from the BBC site , of all places ;)
it won't flood the channel with a long list - use /msg ubotu list
that is easy... but finding a specific file in the repository i have not achieved
in theory apt-file should do it if it exists... puzzling
does apt-file require the full path?
Randall64 I assumed it was using the apt-get database

Randall64 some interesting things emerge... alien ignores obvious dependency for libjack.so.0... ubuntu does not have said file anywhere... apt-file is useful but needs to be updated independently from apt-get... libjack0.80.0 is clearly far newer than djplay... djplay is probably not worth installing ;)
